---

## How to Set Repository Description

1. Go to your repository: https://github.com/stonyp90/Usrly-Agent
2. Click on the ‚öôÔ∏è **Settings** tab
3. Scroll down to the **Repository details** section
4. Edit the **Description** field
5. Paste the short version above
6. Click **Save**

## Alternative Descriptions

### Focus on Features

```
AI agent orchestration platform with enterprise security, multi-model LLM support, real-time communication, and comprehensive monitoring. Built with NestJS, React, TypeScript.
```

### Focus on Technology

```
Enterprise-grade AI agent platform built with NestJS, React, TypeScript, MongoDB, Keycloak OIDC, and gRPC. Features multi-model support, WebSockets, and clean architecture.
```

### Focus on Use Case

```
Build, deploy, and manage AI agents at scale. Enterprise-ready platform with Keycloak authentication, Ollama integration, real-time updates, and comprehensive audit logging.
```
